name: Send Custom Fields From WooCommerce to Active Campaign
author: Daniel Prada

sections.description: This plugin helps you run a script that migrates custom fields from WooCommerce orders into the matching email contacts on ActiveCampaign.
sections.installation:
1. Install plugin
  2. Go to Settings > Send Custom Fields from WooCommerce To Active Campaign
  3. Set the API Key and Base URL
  4. Add the Active Campaign custom field names and ids that match your WooCommerce Installation.
sections.faq:
What fields do you support?

Currently simple text fields.
sections.changelog:
0.1.0

Added ability to send custom values from WooCommerce Customer to ActiveCampaign Contac

short_description: This plugin sends custom fields from WooCommerce orders into Active Campaign contacts.
description: This plugin helps you run a script that migrates custom fields from WooCommerce orders into the matching email contacts on ActiveCampaign.
